articles.title: UK secures two million more doses of Moderna's COVID-19 vaccine - Reuters
articles.description: Britain has secured two million doses of Moderna Inc's COVID-19 vaccine candidate, to be available in Europe as early as the spring, the government said on Sunday, in addition to the 5 million doses it secured from the U.S. company two weeks ago.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff

articles.title: Man arrested after fiery car crash into power pole in SE Portland - KOIN.com
articles.description: Officials said the car was a suspect vehicle for previous attempts to elude and reckless driving incidents.
articles.content:
PORTLAND, Ore. (KOIN) — A man was arrested overnight after he sped off in his car from a traffic stop and crashed his car, causing a fire when it hit a power pole.
